channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Sharon Van Etten & the Attachment Theory Announce Fall 2025 Tour
item.description: 🎵 Pumped for this! Sharon Van Etten & the Attachment Theory hitting the road for a Fall 2025 tour 🚍✨ #livemusic #musicnews

item.title: Turnstile tour announcement being teased for Tuesday
item.description: 🎉 Brace yourselves, Turnstile fans! Something big is coming your way on Tuesday! 🎶 #TurnstileTuesdayTease

item.title: MARINA Announces 2025 North American Headlining Tour
item.description: 🌟 Pack your bags, MARINA is hitting the road in 2025! Who's ready for a front-row seat? 🎶✨ #MARINAtour2025 #LetsGetLoud

item.title: Three 6 Mafia & Bone Thugs-N-Harmony announce tour, with Tech N9ne and DJ Quik
item.description: 🔥 Legends unite! Three 6 Mafia & Bone Thugs-N-Harmony hit the road with Tech N9ne and DJ Quik 🎵 Who's snagging tickets? 🙌 #hiphoplegends

item.title: Doja Cat, Tems, and J Balvin to Headline 2025 FIFA Club World Cup Final Halftime Show
item.description: 🌟 Let's dance! 🎶 Get ready for an electrifying halftime show at the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup Final with Doja Cat, Tems, and J Balvin! 🎉 #MusicNews #FIFA2025 🎤
